Delivery



  • 3-7 Days Deliveries
  • 1-2 Weeks deliveries
  • Mixed next day and 1 - 2 weeks deliveries on the same order.

    • If you have purchased items with different delivery dates on the same order, i.e. next working day delivery, and 1 to 2 week delivery, your items will be delivered altogether

Delivery Information

Next Working Day Delivery items always ship on a working day and are delivered on a working day.



Cut off for receiving your order on next working day is 12 noon.



Once your order has shipped, you will receive an email from the courier to notify you that your order has left us, as well as the courier's name and tracking reference number.



For all our next deliveries you will be notified of one hour delivery window by SMS and/or email by the courier themselves.



Returns are accepted within 14 days, as long as the item is in its original condition and packaging.
